name: grepord
description: Grep for an ordered list of files

scripts.man-src: awk '/# Usage/,/# Release Steps/' README.md | sed '1d' | sed '1d' | sed '$d' | sed 's/`//g'
scripts.build-ronn: npm run --silent man-src > man/grepord.1.ronn && cat footer.txt >> man/grepord.1.ronn
scripts.new-release-tag: PKG_VER=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g');TAG_CMD="git tag -a v$(ECHO $PKG_VER | xargs) -m 'Version $PKG_VER'";eval $TAG_CMD;
scripts.push-release: rm -f ./.git/index.lock && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'New release' && git push origin master
scripts.release: npm run new-release-tag && npm run push-tags && gren release && npm run changelog && npm run push-release
